CLIP.Definition: short piece of video or audio

CLIPS.Definition: short pieces of video or audio

COHERENT.Definition: in a way that is clear and makes sense

DEROGATORY.Definition: in a way that lacks respect

DIVISIVE.Definition: something or someone that divides opinion

JUXTAPOSITION.Definition: opposite things that are next to one another

LOSE HIS TRAIN OF THOUGHT.Definition: forget what he is talking about

MANIPULATOR.Definition: someone who knows how to get others to do what they want

REPEL.Definition: cause someone to strongly dislike you

SUSPENSE.Definition: the feeling of waiting for something

TANGENT.Definition: to go off on a tangent is to talk about something that is unrelated

VULGAR.Definition: rude, not suitable for the circumstances it is used in

WANDER.Definition: to move around without clear purpose or direction
